Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #63/63rd Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Westbound 63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th and 87th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and 87th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and 87th due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 87th at this time.

At this time, shuttle buses are availble to provide connecting service, and also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #29 State buses for North- and Southbound services to 95th Red Line.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
